ygData.subject: Parallel SharpNEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, The latest SharpNEAT 2 development code now includes code to perform genome decoding and evaluation in parallel across multiple CPU cores.The latest

Hi all,

The latest SharpNEAT 2 development code now includes code to perform
genome decoding and evaluation in parallel across multiple CPU
cores.The latest code is available as ever here:
   http://sites.google.com/site/sharpneat/dev-releases-status

Some explanation of what I did is available here:
   http://sites.google.com/site/sharpneat/parallelization


In that link I also briefly discuss an outstanding issue of how best
to parallelize the k-means speciation as it did run slower when I
tried it - something I've never come across before when
multi-threading code (including multi-threading a k-means algorithm in
a different project recently).

Colin.
